item.title: Weekly street cleaning missed!, 18th December
item.description:
Weekly street cleaning missed on Sutherland Road both sides, several weeks of wet, muddy leaves and litter across pavement and kerb edge. Schedule for Wednesday to be swept no cleaner seen. Please can we get street cleaning team out. Thank you.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 26, Sutherland Road, Edmonton, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Excessive drug use, 18th December
item.description:

item.title: Abandoned vehicle parked on public footway, 18th December
item.description:
The council deemed that this is an active public footway on 02/12/2025, and not land belonging to the Lyndon Industrial Estate. As such, this illegally unregistered vehicle is illegally parked on a pedestrian footway and needs to be removed to comply with legislation banning footway parking throughout Greater London made in 1974.

Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Felixstowe Road, Abbey Wood
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Continuous fly tipping, 17th December
item.description:
Almost ever week someone puts random rubbish (storage boxes, old lamp, abandoned furniture outside the wall of our garden. One time they left a lamp and it fell over in the wind and shattered glass everywhere. Please help
Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Cressington Close, Hackney, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Dumped mattress and waste piles, 17th December
item.description:
Various items of waste have been flytipped here

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Coplestone Passage, East Dulwich, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Council street sweepers rubbish bags left for a week, 17th December
item.description:
These bags are in two places on Roydene Road- two at the very start and the two pictured at 56. They are from the council's own street sweepers and have been here since last Friday. We have so much flytipping and littering anyway that it's very frustrating the council actually adds to it. It also attracts additional litter people leave by the bags.

Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Roydene Road, Plumstead
Report on FixMyStreet

Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Bramblebury Road, Plumstead

item.title: Avenue Road side of Green bridge, 17th December
item.description:
Disgraceful! This is how the street has been left after the roadworks have been cleared. You should be ashamed of yourselves. It’s an absolute disgrace. No wonder people use it as a dumping ground, if the council doesn’t even care. The small hole is deep and actually quite dangerous.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Avenue Road, Penge, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet
